channel.title: Enable Security Hub on AWS Well-Architected Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Enable Security Hub on AWS Well-Architected Labs

item.title: Enable AWS Security Hub via AWS Console
item.description: Table of Contents Getting Started 1. Getting Started The AWS console provides a graphical user interface to search and work with the AWS services. We will use the AWS console to enable AWS Security Hub. 1.1 AWS Security Hub Once you have logged into your AWS account you can use the search facility to locate Security Hub. All you need to do is type in Security Hub in the search field.
